MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G22 postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.50am to carry out repairs to faulty electrical equipment at Ronaldsay Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.55pm on Monday 21st December 2020.
